thread.title: CW
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by CW

author: CW
title: CW
text: Keith and Jose were very professional and patient with my buying decision of my sectional couch and mattresses. The delivery folks were also very professional as well. I m very pleased with my furniture purchase and the quality of it. I'm happy I came into this store location. I will definitely come back again.
